languages.text: "Друкари, Ваша Светлость. Они рвутся в Простор большими и малыми эскадрами, чинят кровопролитие на планетах, обращают тысячи в рабство, атакуют корабли. Словно нечто всполошило их в их логове, и теперь они срывают злость на людях".

traits.locale_text: "Друкари, Ваша Светлость!" {n}Равор выплевывает это слово с искренней ненавистью. Другие, судя по лицам, вполне разделяют его чувства.{/n} "Они рвутся в Простор большими и малыми эскадрами, чинят кровопролитие на планетах, обращают тысячи в рабство, атакуют корабли! Даже смерть не страшит их — они слепо прут на нас, не считаясь с потерями! Видимо, спятили от ненависти к Человечеству!"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Drukhari, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Their squadrons, both large and small, are invading the Expanse, unleashing carnage on planets, taking captives by the thousands, and attacking ships. It is as if something has poked their nest, if you will, and now they are lashing out."
languages.original_text: "Друкари, Ваша Светлость. Они рвутся в Простор большими и малыми эскадрами, чинят кровопролитие на планетах, обращают тысячи в рабство, атакуют корабли. Словно нечто всполошило их в их логове, и теперь они срывают злость на людях".

traits.locale_text: "Drukhari, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!" {n}Ravor spits the word out with heartfelt hatred. Others fully share his sentiments, judging by the looks on their faces.{/n} "Their large and small squadrons are invading the Expanse, unleashing carnage on planets, enslaving thousands, and attacking ships! They don't even fear death — they just rush us blindly with no regard for losses! Their hatred of Humanity must've driven them crazy!"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Drukhari, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!" {n}Ravor spits the word out with heartfelt hatred. Others fully share his sentiments, judging by the looks on their faces.{/n} "Their large and small squadrons are invading the Expanse, unleashing carnage on planets, enslaving thousands, and attacking ships! They don't even fear death — they just rush us blindly with no regard for losses! Their hatred of Humanity must've driven them crazy!"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Drukhari, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!" {n}Ravor spits the word out with heartfelt hatred. Others, judging by their expressions, share his sentiments.{/n} "Their squadrons, both large and small, are invading the Expanse, unleashing carnage on planets, enslaving thousands, and attacking ships! Even death does not frighten them — they strike blindly with no regard for their own losses! Their hatred of Humanity must have driven them insane!"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Drukhari, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!" {n}Ravor spits the word out with heartfelt hatred. Others, judging by their expressions, share his sentiments.{/n} "Their squadrons, both large and small, are invading the Expanse, unleashing carnage on planets, enslaving thousands, and attacking ships! Even death does not frighten them — they strike blindly with no regard for their own losses! Their hatred of Humanity must have driven them insane!"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Drukhari, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Their squadrons, both large and small, are invading the Expanse, unleashing carnage on planets, taking captives by the thousands, and attacking ships. It is as if something has poked their nest, if you will, and now they are lashing out."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Drukhari, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Their squadrons, both large and small, are invading the Expanse, unleashing carnage on planets, taking captives by the thousands, and attacking ships. It is as if something has poked their nest, if you will, and now they are lashing out."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: «Drukhari, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Unidades grandes y pequeñas de esa chusma invaden la Extensión. Están masacrando planetas enteros, llevándose miles de cautivos y atacando naves. Es como si alguien hubiera provocado a un avispero y ahora estuvieran reaccionando».
languages.original_text: "Drukhari, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Their squadrons, both large and small, are invading the Expanse, unleashing carnage on planets, taking captives by the thousands, and attacking ships. It is as if something has poked their nest, if you will, and now they are lashing out."

traits.locale_text: «Drukhari, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Unidades grandes y pequeñas de esa chusma invaden la Extensión. Están masacrando planetas enteros, llevándose miles de cautivos y atacando naves. Es como si alguien hubiera provocado a un avispero y ahora estuvieran reaccionando».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: “是黑暗灵族，大人。他们大大小小的舰队疯狂地入侵科罗努斯扩区，四处袭击舰船，在各个行星上展开大屠杀，抓了成千上万的俘虏。如果您允许我这么形容的话，我感觉就像是有什么人端了他们的老巢一样，他们简直像是倾巢而出。”
languages.original_text: "Drukhari, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Their squadrons, both large and small, are invading the Expanse, unleashing carnage on planets, taking captives by the thousands, and attacking ships. It is as if something has poked their nest, if you will, and now they are lashing out."

traits.locale_text: “是黑暗灵族，大人。他们大大小小的舰队疯狂地入侵科罗努斯扩区，四处袭击舰船，在各个行星上展开大屠杀，抓了成千上万的俘虏。如果您允许我这么形容的话，我感觉就像是有什么人端了他们的老巢一样，他们简直像是倾巢而出。”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: « Des Drukharis, Votre Seigneurie. Leurs escadrons envahissent les Étendues ; ils mettent nos planètes à feu et à sang, réduisent des populations entières en esclavage et s'en prennent aux vaisseaux ! C'est comme si quelque chose avait dérangé leur nid et qu'ils frappaient à l'aveugle pour se venger. »
languages.original_text: "Drukhari, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Their squadrons, both large and small, are invading the Expanse, unleashing carnage on planets, taking captives by the thousands, and attacking ships. It is as if something has poked their nest, if you will, and now they are lashing out."

traits.locale_text: « Des Drukharis, Votre Seigneurie. Leurs escadrons envahissent les Étendues ; ils mettent nos planètes à feu et à sang, réduisent des populations entières en esclavage et s'en prennent aux vaisseaux ! C'est comme si quelque chose avait dérangé leur nid et qu'ils frappaient à l'aveugle pour se venger. »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: 「デュカーリです、陛下。彼らの中隊は大小を問わず、エクスパンスに侵入し、惑星に殺戮を繰り広げ、何千もの捕虜を奪い、船を攻撃しています。まるで何かが彼らの巣を突いたかのように、そして今、彼らは暴れだしたのです」
languages.original_text: "Drukhari, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Their squadrons, both large and small, are invading the Expanse, unleashing carnage on planets, taking captives by the thousands, and attacking ships. It is as if something has poked their nest, if you will, and now they are lashing out."

traits.locale_text: 「デュカーリです、陛下。彼らの中隊は大小を問わず、エクスパンスに侵入し、惑星に殺戮を繰り広げ、何千もの捕虜を奪い、船を攻撃しています。まるで何かが彼らの巣を突いたかのように、そして今、彼らは暴れだしたのです」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Drukhari, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ihre Geschwader, groß wie klein, fallen in die Ausdehnung ein, richten auf Planeten Massaker an, nehmen Tausende gefangen und attackieren Schiffe! Es ist, als hätte jemand in ihr Nest gestochen, wenn Ihr so wollt, und nun schwärmen sie aus."
languages.original_text: "Drukhari, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Their squadrons, both large and small, are invading the Expanse, unleashing carnage on planets, taking captives by the thousands, and attacking ships. It is as if something has poked their nest, if you will, and now they are lashing out."

traits.locale_text: "Drukhari, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}!" {n}Ravor spuckt das Wort mit einem Hass aus, der von Herzen kommt. Andere teilen diese Ansicht, ihren Mienen nach zu urteilen.{/n} "Ihre Geschwader, groß wie klein, fallen in die Ausdehnung ein, richten auf Planeten Blutbäder an, versklaven Tausende und attackieren Schiffe! Selbst der Tod macht ihnen keine Angst. Sie schlagen blind zu, ohne Rücksicht auf ihre eigenen Verluste! Ihr Hass auf die Menschheit muss sie in den Wahnsinn getrieben haben!"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bir de Drukhariler var. Büyüklü küçüklü tüm eskadralarıyla Enginlik'i işgal ediyor, gezegenleri kırıp geçiyor, binlerce tutsak alıyor ve gemilere saldırıyorlar. Birileri yuvalarına çomak sokmuş da intikam alıyorlar sanki."
languages.original_text: "Drukhari, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Their squadrons, both large and small, are invading the Expanse, unleashing carnage on planets, taking captives by the thousands, and attacking ships. It is as if something has poked their nest, if you will, and now they are lashing out."
